example.name: autogen1
example.text: With a conservative debt-to-equity ratio of 1-to-1 -- and $ 329 million in cash -- Manville is indeed actively on the prowl .

example.text: In France , Suez and Axa-Midi Assurances S.A. both have been on the prowl for giant acquisitions
